title: Numbers - Do you use separators to improve numbers' readability?
Reference - Do you use the right order of instructions?
Reference - Do you use the correct symbols when documenting instructions?
Hardware - Do you track and label your assets?
Do you refer to the reader and author consistently throughout your document?
Do you allow multiple options rather than forcing a best fit?
Do you highlight relevant words/segments in your content?
Do you know all the things you can use QR codes for?
(After work) Do you only check-in code when it has compiled and passed the unit tests?
